Description:
Affordable Opportunity. Desirable Pocket
Just moments to the bus, school and expansive parklands and an easy stroll to Greenbrook Village, look no further if you are a first-home buyer or investor keen on an affordable entry in this preferred pocket. A short drive or bus ride to Westfield and the station, the warm, inviting interior includes three bedrooms, updated bathroom with a freestanding bath, "L" shaped living dining and a well laid out kitchen. Finished with Bosch appliances, it overlooks the family meals area. Deep and wide the rear yard introduces two alfresco zones. Separated by a broad expanse of lawn, one includes a woodfire pizza oven, while the other offers built in seating. Both are roofed for year-round enjoyment. With ducted heating and evaporative cooling, timber floors, secure covered parking behind a roller door on a generous allotment. You'll need to move fast to make McFarlane mine.
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
653m2 of Prime Vacant Land
Secure this wonderful opportunity and build your dream home, or develop multiple dwellings S.T.C.A
Located in a prime quiet court in Epping, this 653m2 block is bursting with character and potential. Lifestyle in Orlit Court is one of seclusion, comfort and convenience, with both Epping and South Morang amenities on your doorstep. Find the likes of Primary, Secondary and Preschools within 700m, Reserves and Whittlesea Athletics only minutes away and the daily convenience of South Morang Train Station and Westfield Plenty Valley only 1.5km from your new address.
Opportunities to establish yourself from the ground up do not come around often, don't let this investment pass, enquire today.
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.
219 High Street Thomastown
767 High Street Epping
510 Plenty Road Mill Park
952-954 High Street Reservoir
http://rata.harcourts.com.au/Home/statement-of-information

Description:
Great Investment In Prime Location
This magnificent home is located in the high sought after Lyndarum Estate with easy access to all facilities.
The home boasts 3 large bedrooms (master with walk in robe and ensuite), study or potential 4th bedroom, quality kitchen with 900mm appliances and stone bench tops, open plan meals and family room, separate lounge room, split system cooling, ducted heating, 2.7m ceilings, downlights, fully landscaped with exposed aggregate driveway, and garage with drive through access to backyard!
Would make a great investment with a current lease till December 2019 at $1,608 per month.

Description:
Stylish Spacious Affordable Living
This single level home, nestled at the rear of only two introduces a stylish, spacious affordable opportunity in a sought-after location. Ensuring easy living and entertaining, a very generous courtyard with gated access to a huge reserve (perfect for the dogs and the kids), links seamlessly to a spacious open plan living zone, wrapping around a kitchen featuring quality stainless steel appliances and an abundance of cupboards and bench space. The main bedroom is complemented by a second bedroom, with both being served by a generously proportioned family bathroom. A large fitted laundry, garage with extra parking, split system heating and cooling to the open plan living zone are all welcome bonuses in an already enticing opportunity. Central to Epping Plaza and station along with South Morang station and Westfield, it is ideal for first home buyers, investors and downsizers.

Description:
CAN'T TAKE MY EYES OFF YOU!
This is a wonderful, bright, spacious home. Jam packed with value: big bedrooms, main with its own private courtyard, full ensuite & walk in robe. 12.5 foot entrance ceilings with polished boards. 9.5 foot ceilings throughout. 2 generous living zones, central heating, split heating/cooling, beautiful high quality window furnishings, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, 40mm granite kitchen bench tops, very secure with CCTV, alarm, double garage with internal access, double alfresco, low maintenance yard, outdoor spa & more.
Seeing is believing; book your appointment today!

Description:
BEAUTIFUL HOME, UNBEATABLE LOCATION.
UNDER INSTRUCTIONS TO BE SOLD!
Step into this immaculate park facing modern home, offering spacious 4 bedrooms. The master bedroom features an ensuite and WIRs, while the other three bedrooms are serviced by a modern central bathroom. The well equipped modern kitchen showcases s/s appliances overlooking the open dining and family living area. Glass sliders introduce a large backyard perfect for all year-round entertainer's delight. Additional features include ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, remote double garage, quality window furnishings and plenty of storage. Within easy access to the new Edgars road and walking distance to the new Wollert shopping centre comprising Coles & Aldi, Harvest Home primary school and much more. Inspect today!

Description:
Exceptional Space and Quality!
Immaculately maintained throughout, this spacious three bedroom home features a large lounge, spacious kitchen with stone bench tops and Stainless Steel appliances, adjoining meals area, generous bedrooms with built in robes serviced by a central bathroom and en-suite to the master with Walk in Robe, a full sized separate laundry, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and downstairs powder room.
The backyard provides plenty of room to entertain or for the kids to play and car accommodation is plentIful with a single garage plus carport to the front.
Located in the heart of the Hayston Valley Estate providing easy access to the Lyndarum shopping precinct, nearby parkland, transport and quality schools.
Inspections are by appointment, enquire now!
NB. Regarding indicated Price - Please understand, particularly on the more 'popular' properties or in a 'hot' property market that more than one buyer may be interested in the same property. When that happens, all buyers will be given EQUAL OPPORTUNITY TO MAKE THEIR BEST OFFERS.

Description:
SOLD by Sugath Warnasuriya-More Homes Wanted!
Centrally located in the heart of Lyndarum Estate within walking distance to Epping Views Primary school & Kindergarten this beautiful family home offers North facing aspect & unfolds over two glorious levels. There are three generously-sized bedrooms + Study or 4th bedroom serviced by 3 bathrooms. All bedrooms also offer built-in robes & master is a stylish retreat complete with his and hers' walk-in robes & a full en-suite. There is a formal lounge and a separate up stair retreat that offers the potential to be converted into additional bedrooms for large families.
The lower level features a gleaming white kitchen with stone bench tops, 900mm appliances and sleek modern cabinetry with plenty of cupboard space an island bench. Fitted with stylish wooden flooring, down-lights & large windows that brings in plenty of natural light this home satisfies every requirement for the busy professionals and their family. Other extras include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, internal laundry, Alfresco, double garage & low maintenance backyard.
Built Year- 2010
Builder- Modina Homes
Potential rental return- $420-$450 Per Week

Description:
Unparalleled Luxury with city views
Stunning in every way this home is offering exceptional accommodation with the flexibility of lifestyle to create the ideal family environment in a sought-after pocket of Epping.
Centrally located and within walking distance to the new Aurora Village Shopping Centre which includes Coles, Aldi, Degani Café and a range of speciality shops, Harvest Home Primary school and the 357 Bus (which stops at Epping northern hospital and Epping pacific).
The home itself is finished with absolute quality and attention to detail featuring a total of 4 bedrooms, master complete with full ensuite, walk in robe and city views.
An abundance of space throughout with various living quarters entailing a formal lounge, study, upstairs retreat area, spacious family room, stylish open plan kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances, walk in pantry and adjoining meals area overlooking the delightful undercover decked entertainment area. Other features include 20 solar panels with 5kw inverter, 8 reverse cycle split systems, alarm system, double garage and storage shed.
With so much more to offer for you and your families’ future, come see it for yourself. You won’t be disappointed!

Completed with a true sense of style, this elegant home boasts a generous free flowing floor plan packed with sophistication. Offering four bedrooms in total, the master suite is serviced with a luxury
ensuite, his and hers vanities with natural granite tops, floor to ceiling tiles, tiled shower base and 5 meter walk-in-robe fit for king and queen.

An inviting family room offering a stunning fireplace to keep your family warm through the winter nights. 3 sets of timber by fold doors open out to the second kitchen and outdoor alfresco area, indoor/outdoor living at its finest.
All the creature comforts are present including gas heating, refrigerated cooling throughout, alarm system, solar panel system, ducted vacuum and much much more.
This prestigious home is matched by a privileged location in the established part of the Lyndarum Estate within walking distance to the Lyndarum shopping precinct, schools and parks.

Description:
Explore your Empire
Located in the heart of Epping, like a star in the north, Empire Epping will rise above the rest offering unsurpassed premium real estate opportunities with apartments offering 1, 2 & 3 bedroom configurations with quality fixtures and fittings, garage allocation, inhouse gym and wellness centre, cafes, restaurants and supermarket.
Just minutes from the door of EMPIRE EPPING you'll find a world of facilities and amenities — everything you and your family need to live, learn and work. Less than 2km away is Pacific Epping, one of the region's largest shopping precincts, boasting 230-plus stores, three major supermarkets, fresh food precinct, bars, cafes and restaurants and more.
Setting a new standard in high-end integrated living, EMPIRE EPPING offers a complete lifestyle package in one of Melbourne's most affordable up-and-coming areas. Whether you're looking to set your family up in style, downsize for luxury and convenience, or invest in a hot growth region, claim your place in EMPIRE EPPING - A World Within.

Completed with a true sense of style, this elegant home boasts a generous free flowing floorplan packed with sophistication. Offering 4 bedrooms, the huge master is serviced by a walk in robe and full ensuite. Split system cooling, refrigerated cooling and ducted heating, roller shutters and
a single lock up garage, located within close proximity to public transport, local schools, Epping Plaza, parks and easy access to the Hume Hwy.
Property currently leased until July 2018 at $1,521pcm. If you are investor or first home owner, this is a fantastic opportunity not to be missed, arrange an Inspection today!!

Description:
Low maintenance living in central location
Escape to a tranquil hideaway in the heart of Epping with this outstanding single level brick home, offering a great first step into the market, a superb downsizing opportunity or quality investment.
This beautifully presented two-bedroom property features flowing floor boards throughout, the kitchen boast stainless appliance with ample bench space overlooking a generous family meals area opening to a private courtyard perfect outdoor entertaining.
The practical floor plan also includes a spacious master & generous second bedroom, both with built in robes & serviced by the family bathroom with separate bath and shower. A remote single lockup garage plus room for a second car in the driveway.
All this only minutes' walk to public transport, shops, schools, cafes/restaurants and with easy access to Pacific Epping shopping centre and the Metropolitan Ring road.

Description:
Palatial Prestige, Prime Position
Rarely does the opportunity present itself to enter the market in such style. This quality home offers something for the whole family. Meticulously constructed by a reputable local builder, the attention to detail is evident throughout this impressive residence. Comprising a total of four bedrooms, the master suite is serviced by a W.I.R and grand ensuite in addition to a luxurious central bathroom. With no shortage of living space, a formal lounge downstairs is complimented by a retreat upstairs while a massive open plan dining and living space is overlooked by a modern designer kitchen complete with stone benchtops and high end appliances including dishwasher & in-built coffee machine. Entertainers will be in their element under the covered alfresco area as their friends and family enjoy the in-ground pool surrounded by a picturesque garden.
A long list of luxuries include; Two car garage with internal and drive through access, outdoor gas connection for BBQ, intercom, low maintenance yard, refrigerated heating and cooling, spotted gum floorboards along with a premier Lyndarum location nestled among parklands, schools, transport and shopping to create the perfect future for your family!

Description:
Explore your Empire
Located in the heart of Epping, like a star in the north, Empire Epping will rise above the rest offering unsurpassed premium real estate opportunities with apartments offering 1, 2 & 3 bedroom configurations with quality fixtures and fittings, garage allocation, inhouse gym and wellness centre, cafes, restaurants and supermarket.
Just minutes from the door of EMPIRE EPPING you'll find a world of facilities and amenities — everything you and your family need to live, learn and work. Less than 2km away is Pacific Epping, one of the region's largest shopping precincts, boasting 230-plus stores, three major supermarkets, fresh food precinct, bars, cafes and restaurants and more.
Setting a new standard in high-end integrated living, EMPIRE EPPING offers a complete lifestyle package in one of Melbourne's most affordable up-and-coming areas. Whether you're looking to set your family up in style, downsize for luxury and convenience, or invest in a hot growth region, claim your place in EMPIRE EPPING - A World Within.
